Title: Authorizes the issuance of distinctive legion of valor license plates
Summary: Authorizes the issuance of distinctive legion of valor license plates for individuals who have received the army medal of honor, navy medal of honor, air force medal of honor, army distinguished service cross, navy cross, coast guard cross, or air force cross.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to distinctive plates for legion of valor recipients
